name: BMO-Git-Test
description: Prototype that does not involve Jenkins and polls Git for updates and triggers deployment

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

properties.scriptBody:
export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-11-openjdk-amd64

for name in `find . -name "*.req" -cmin -5`
do
    echo $name
    reqFile=`echo $name | cut -f4 -d'/'`
    project=`echo $name | cut -f2 -d'/'`
    echo $reqFile
    echo $project
    
    echo "{
	\"application\": \"BMO-Git-Test\",
	\"applicationProcess\": \"Trigger_Deploy\",
	\"environment\": \"AUTODP\",
	\"onlyChanged\": \"false\",
	\"properties\": {" > deploy.json
	
	echo "             \"ProjectPath\": \"Projects/$project/new-requests\"," >> deploy.json
	echo "             \"NewRequestFileName\": \"$reqFile\"" >> deploy.json
	
	echo "	},
	\"versions\": [
	   {
		\"version\": \"latest\",
		\"component\": \"BMO-Git-AutoDP\"
	   }
	]
}" >> deploy.json

    cat deploy.json
    
    /opt/IBM/ucd/udclient/udclient -username admin -password Think2020! -weburl https://bmo.ibmdevops.com:8443 requestApplicationProcess deploy.json
done

properties.scriptBody:
export JAVA_HOME=${p:component/JAVA_HOME}

for name in `find . -name "*.req" -cmin -5`
do
    echo Request: $name
    
    reqFile=`echo $name | cut -f5 -d'/'`
    project=`echo $name | cut -f3 -d'/'`
    echo Filename: $reqFile
    echo Project: $project
    
    echo "{
	\"application\": \"BMO-Git-Test\",
	\"applicationProcess\": \"Trigger_Deploy\",
	\"environment\": \"AUTODP\",
	\"onlyChanged\": \"false\",
	\"properties\": {" > deploy.json
	
	echo "             \"ProjectPath\": \"${p:component/REPO_PROJECT_ROOT}/$project/${p:component/REPO_REQUEST_ROOT}\"," >> deploy.json
	echo "             \"NewRequestFileName\": \"$reqFile\"" >> deploy.json
	
	echo "	},
	\"versions\": [
	   {
		\"version\": \"latest\",
		\"component\": \"BMO-Git-AutoDP\"
	   }
	]
}" >> deploy.json

    cat deploy.json
    
    ${p:component/UDClient_Install_Root}/udclient -username ${p:component/UCD_User} -password ${p:component/UCD_Password} -weburl ${p:component/UCD_URL} requestApplicationProcess deploy.json
done
